```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(mlr3website)

library(data.table)
library(DT)
requireNamespace("mlr3verse")

content = as.data.table(mlr3::mlr_tasks)[, .(label, key, task_type, nrow, ncol)]
setnames(content, c("Name", "Key", "Task Type", "# rows", "# cols"))
```

```{r, layout="l-page"}

  rownames= FALSE)
```
